text: Dughiabar zurara, Judan ofa gamir gumaziba, Godɨn uan Nguibam Itim bagh asɨziba tue da isia mɨghɨrir ofaba, ko ofan igharazir mabar amusɨ, bizir manam bagh ia mɨkɨmtɨ, ia da isɨ me danɨng. Bulmakaun apurir igiaba, sipsipɨn apuriba, sipsipɨn nguziba o wit, amangsɨzim, wainɨn dɨpam, o olivɨn borem, ia dughiatam ataghɨraghan markɨ, ia zurara dughiabar me danɨng.
